We‚Äôre Hiring: People Excellence Consultant - Rewards @ xto10x

If you‚Äôre passionate about solving high-leverage rewards problems for startups from compensation benchmarking and incentive design to ESOP/RSU structuring, we‚Äôd love to talk.

You‚Äôll work closely with founders, CXOs, and a deeply committed team on real, high-impact org-building problems.

While Total Rewards will be your core focus, you‚Äôll also get exposure to areas like org design, performance management, and broader HR transformation.

Role Details:
üìç Location: Bangalore (Hybrid - 2 days/week in office)
üéì Background: Open to recent post-MBAs (2022-2024); startup or consulting experience is a plus
üí∞ Compensation: Competitive mix of cash + ESOPs

Operations Excellence at xto10x
Operations Excellence at xto10x
1mo ‚Ä¢ 
 1 month ago ‚Ä¢ Visible to anyone on or off LinkedIn
Ever wondered how to unlock 5‚Äì7% CM1 in a D2C business through operations excellence?

That‚Äôs exactly what we set out to explore in our founders-only roundtables this April and May.

These sessions brought together sharp, curious, and candid founders. The magic? It wasn‚Äôt just about learning‚Äîit was about collective problem-solving seeded by‚Äòs tested frameworks, real-life case studies, and rich founder experiences. Every question sparked insights. Every challenge turned into a shared opportunity for growth.

We deep-dived into logistics and warehouse costs and levers to control them, the true impact of delivery speed and accurate promise on profitability, the constant trade-off between cost efficiency and customer delight, and in the process we busted myths like ‚Äúfaster = costlier‚Äù

The outcome? Actionable takeaways, new ways of thinking, and a community of founders helping each other win.

Check out the highlights to see these powerful conversations in action.

Big thanks to all the founders who made these sessions truly special with their openness and insight.

Gagandeep M.
